ApplySeparation.Description: When set to false, NPCs wont try to avoid each other or player, it can lead to them stacking together, but can help to avoid jerky-like movemenet in enclosed space.

WanderRadius.Description: General wander radius for idle wander and wander on the break.

ViewRange.Description: The range from which the target will be seen. If zero, sight will be disabled.

ViewSector.Description: The view sector within which the target needs to be to be seen.

HearingRange.Description: The range from which the target will be heard. If zero, hearing will be disabled.

AbsoluteDetectionRange.Description: The range at which a target is guaranteed to be detected. If zero, abosulte detection will be disabled.

ChanceToBeAlertedWhenReceivingCallForHel.Description: Percentage chance to engage in combat if another intelligent NPC engages a target.

AlertedRange.Description: A range within which the player can be seen/sensed when the NPC is alerted to their presence. Should be equal or lower than LeashDistance.

AlertedTime.Description: How long to wait in an alerted state before switching to active combat.

RunThreshold.Description: Relative speed at which run animation should be used. A value of 1 disables run animations

WakingIdleBehaviorComponent.Description: The component used for waking idle behavior.

DayFlavorAnimation.Description: A flavor animation to play during the day. Ignored if null or empty.

DayFlavorAnimationLength.Description: How long to play the daytime flavor animation.

Patrol.Description: Whether or not this NPC will patrol during its waking hours, either alone or as part of a group.

PatrolPathName.Description: The specific name of the patrol path to follow. If left empty will follow any patrol path.

FollowPatrolPath.Description: Whether this NPC will follow patrol paths at all.

PatrolWanderDistance.Description: How far to wander when patrolling and not following a path before taking a break.

Weapons.Description: NPC Weapons (and other main hand items).

DefaultHotbarSlot.Description: Default hotbar slot to equip (i.e. weapon).

RandomIdleHotbarSlot.Description: A hotbar slot that will randomly be held during idle behavior. -1 to disable.

ChanceToEquipFromIdleHotbarSlot.Description: Between 0 and 100, a chance to equip the item during idle behavior INSTEAD of wander or any other idle behavior. TODO: make it a continue? prevent it from hitting 100 all the time?

DefaultOffHandSlot.Description: Default off-hand item slot. -1 for nothing.

NighttimeOffhandSlot.Description: OffHand slot to set during night. -1 for nothing.

LeashDistance.Description: The range after which an NPC will start to want to return to their spawn point.

LeashMinPlayerDistance.Description: The minimum distance from the player before the NPC will be willing to give up on the chase.

LeashTimer.Description: How long the NPC must be more than the minimum distance form the player and too far from leash before giving up.

HardLeashDistance.Description: An absolute maximum from the the leash position the NPC can go before turning back.

CombatMessageTargetGroups.Description: Which NPC type groups to alert when entering combat.

InvestigateRange.Description: Range within which an NPC is willing to investigate reports of an attack or other event.

UseCombatActionEvaluator.Description: Whether to use the Combat Action Evaluator via an accompanying CombatConfig. This completely replaces all other combat behavior but still uses movement properties such as strafe durations and move speeds.

AttackDistance.Description: The distance at which an NPC will execute attacks

DesiredAttackDistanceRange.Description: The distance within which the NPC wants to be from its target while attacking. The max value should be lower than AttackDistance.

AttackPauseRange.Description: The range for absolute minimum time before an NPC can execute a second attack (or block).

CombatRelativeTurnSpeed.Description: Modifier that decides turn speed difference in combat.

CombatBehaviorDistance.Description: The distance within which to switch from smart chasing to combat-oriented movement behavior.

CombatDirectWeight.Description: Weight for the direct combat movement behavior (i.e. just going straight at the target, maintaining a close distance and attacking. Set to 0 to disable.

CombatAlwaysMovingWeight.Description: Weight for the combat movement behavior where the NPC will always charge at you while attacking. Set to 0 to disable.

CombatStrafeWeight.Description: Weight for the combat strafing movement behavior. Set to 0 to disable.

CombatStrafingDurationRange.Description: How long to strafe for when in the combat strafing movement behavior. Only applies if CombatStrafeWeight is greater than 0.

CombatStrafingFrequencyRange.Description: How frequently to strafe when in the combat strafing movement behavior. Only applies if CombatStrafeWeight is greater than 0.

CombatAttackPreDelay.Description: The time delay range before the NPC performs an attack, provided it's in attack range.

CombatAttackPostDelay.Description: The time delay range after the NPC performs an attack, provided it's in attack range.

CombatBackOffAfterAttack.Description: Whether to back off after performing an attack.

CombatBackOffDistanceRange.Description: How far to back off after performing an attack. Max should be lower than the CombatBehaviorDistance.

CombatBackOffDurationRange.Description: How long to back off for after performing an attack.

BlockAbility.Description: The interaction to use for blocking when backing away. Set to empty to disable blocking.

BlockProbability.Description: The probability this NPC will block when backing away if a BlockAbility is set.

CombatFleeIfTooCloseDistance.Description: In combat, if the target gets within this distance for a certain amount of time, the NPC will attempt to flee to a safe distance instead of simply backing away. Set to 0 to disable behavior.

AdditionalCombatBehaviorMacroElement.Description: An optional macro element for supplying more bespoke combat movement behavior. Weight for the behavior must be internally defined in the macro element.

TargetSwitchTimer.Description: Minimum time the NPC will be locked onto a single target before switching

TargetRange.Description: The distance the target needs to be within to maintain priority over other targets while in combat

ChaseRelativeSpeed.Description: Relative chasing speed when pursuing a target.

CombatMovingRelativeSpeed.Description: Relative speed to use during combat specific movement (e.g. to achieve slower strafing).

CombatBackwardsRelativeSpeed.Description: Relative speed to use during combat when backing away from target.

FlockArray.Description: Array containing NPCs for this flock type.

DisableDamageGroups.Description: Groups not to take damage from.

ConfusedTimeRange.Description: How long the NPC should act confused for when losing its target before beginning the search. While confused the NPC detection range is lowered.

SearchTimeRange.Description: How long the NPC should actively search for its lost target before giving up and going back to idle.

IsMemory.Description: Defines if the NPC is a memory

MemoriesCategory.Description: Defines the category of the memory

MemoriesNameOverride.Description: Overrides the memory name if set

BreathesInWater.Description: Whether this NPC can breathe underwater.

NameTranslationKey.Description: Translation key for NPC name display
